org.openimaj.hadoop.tools.twitter.utils

Class WordDFIDF

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.hadoop.tools.twitter.utils.WordDFIDF
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<WordDFIDF>, Readable, ReadableASCII, ReadableBinary, ReadWriteable, Writeable, WriteableASCII, WriteableBinary
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WordDFIDFValue

    public class WordDFIDF
extends Object
implements ReadWriteable, Comparable<WordDFIDF>
    Convenience class which holds all the components required to calculate DF-IDF
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
